A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the movie want at all what I expected\, I really enjoyed it. It's a movie that challenges the characters and doesn't reward then easily. In fact\, one of the most hated scenes is one where a character seems to suceed far too easily and unexpectedly. However\, this movie also dismiss a lot of the mysteries set up in the last film. So if you were waiting 2 years to learn more about Snoke\, or the knights of Ren\, you'll be disappointed. But then again\, star wars has always saved some back story for expanded universe venues\, so I'm willing to forgive that.
